channel.title: confidential smart contract on Second State News and Articles
channel.description: Recent content in confidential smart contract on Second State News and Articles

item.title: Second State Functions releases a developer preview for high performance serverless functions
item.description: Second State has recently released a developer preview of its Function-as-a-Service (FaaS), known as Second State Functions. The Second State Functions enables developers to write simple functions in the Rust programming language for computationally intensive tasks such as image processing and AI inference. The developer simply needs to upload the compiled function to the FaaS service, and the function will become publically available as a web service. The developer preview version of the Second State Functions is free to use.

item.title: Second State partners with Oasis Foundation and Gitcoin to host The Quest for ROSE
item.description: Developers rejoice! A new week, a new hackathon with great prizes! The Oasis Foundation announced the Quest for ROSE: An Oasis Network Hackathon in partnership with Gitcoin and Second State from 9th November to 2nd December. There are two challenges for the Quest for ROSE hackathon. One is to use Parcel SDK of Oasis Network to develop responsible data apps. The other one is to use Oasis Ethereum ParaTimeto develop ethereum-compatible Dapps.

item.title: Developers created 3274 smart contracts in the Oasis Second State Hackathon
item.description: Oasis Foundation and Second State partnered on a community hackathon from 12th to 23rd Oct to bring Ethereum developers to the Oasis Ethereum ParaTime. Now, the results are in! Community developers created 3274 smart contracts and published 759 decentralized web apps in 11 days! The Oasis Second State Hackathon set up three challenges for developers to complete. When developers complete any of the challenges, they get ROSE (the native token of the Oasis network) as rewards.
